trans-unit.source: Make sure that you're using GNU utils for building, including make, cmake, gcc, gawk, getopt, autotools, libtool, automake, autoconf and bazaar.
trans-unit.target: Assurez-vous que vous utilisez les utils GNU pour la construction,y compris make,cmake,gcc,gawk,getopt,autotools,libtool,automake,autoconf et bazaar.

trans-unit.source: Make sure that your operating system can cope with the number of open file descriptors required by the table_open_cache setting. If table_open_cache is set too high, MariaDB may start to refuse connections as the operating system runs out of file descriptors. Also note that the MyISAM (and Aria?) storage engines need two file descriptors per open table.
trans-unit.target: Assurez-vous que votre système d'exploitation peut gérer le nombre de descripteurs de fichiers ouverts requis par le paramètre table_open_cache.Si le paramètre table_open_cache est trop élevé,MariaDB peut commencer à refuser des connexions car le système d'exploitation est à court de descripteurs de fichiers.Notez également que les moteurs de stockage MyISAM (et Aria ?)ont besoin de deux descripteurs de fichiers par table ouverte.

Make switching of index due to small limit cost-based (WL#6986) : We have made the decision in make_join_select() of whether to switch to a new index in order to support "ORDER BY ... LIMIT N" cost-based. This work fixes Bug#73837.
trans-unit.target: 由于基于成本的限制较小而进行索引的切换（WL＃6986）：我们在make_join_select（）中做出了是否切换至新索引的决定，以便支持基于成本的“ ORDER BY ... LIMIT N” 。这项工作修复了Bug＃73837。

trans-unit.source: Make switching of index due to small limit cost-based (WL#6986) : We have made the decision in make_join_select() of whether to switch to a new index in order to support "ORDER BY ... LIMIT N" cost-based. This work fixes Bug#73837.
trans-unit.target: 由于基于成本的限制较小而进行索引的切换（WL＃6986）：我们在make_join_select（）中做出了是否要切换至新索引的决定，以便支持基于成本的“ ORDER BY ... LIMIT N” 。这项工作修复了Bug＃73837。

trans-unit.source: Many Linux distributions have Sphinx in their repositories. These can be used to install Sphinx instead of following the instructions below, but these are usually quite old versions and don't all include API's for easy integration. Ubuntu users can use the updated repository at https://launchpad.net/~builds/+archive/sphinxsearch-rel21 (see instructions below). Alternatively, download from http://sphinxsearch.com/downloads/release/
trans-unit.target: 许多Linux发行版的存储库中都包含Sphinx。这些可以用来安装Sphinx，而不是按照下面的说明进行操作，但是它们通常是很旧的版本，并且并不都包含API以便于集成。 Ubuntu用户可以通过https://launchpad.net/~builds/+archive/sphinxsearch-rel21使用更新的存储库（请参阅下面的说明）。或者，从http://sphinxsearch.com/downloads/release/下载

trans-unit.source: Many applications produce CSV files having some fields quoted, in particular because the field text contains the separator character. For such files, specify the 'QUOTED=n' option to indicate the level of quoting and/or the 'QCHAR=c' to specify what is this eventual quoting character, which is " by default. Quoting with single quotes must be specified as QCHAR=''''. On writing, fields will be quoted depending on the value of the quoting level, which is –1 by default meaning no quoting:
trans-unit.target: 许多应用程序生成的CSV文件都有一些带引号的字段，特别是因为字段文本包含分隔符。对于此类文件，请指定“ QUOTED = n ”选项来指示引用级别，和/或“ QCHAR=c ”来指定该最终引用字符是什么，默认情况下为 " 。必须使用单引号将其指定为 QCHAR='''' 。在编写时，将根据引用级别的值对字段进行引用，默认情况下为 –1 ，表示不引用：

trans-unit.source: Many companies or administrations must deal with distributed information. CONNECT enables to deal with it efficiently without having to copy it to a centralized database. Let us suppose we have on some remote network machines m1, m2, … mn some information contained in two tables t1 and t2.
trans-unit.target: 许多公司或主管部门必须处理分布式信息。CONNECT可以有效地处理它，而不必将其复制到集中式数据库中。让我们假设我们在某些远程网络机器m1，m2，... mn上有一些包含在两个表t1和t2中的信息。

trans-unit.source: Many components in the Galera replication library were redesigned and improved with the introduction of MariaDB 10.4, which includes Galera 4.
trans-unit.target: 通过引入包括Galera 4 的MariaDB 10.4，重新设计和改进了Galera复制库中的许多组件。

trans-unit.source: Many data types make no or little sense when applied to plain files. This why CONNECT supports only a restricted set of data types. However, ODBC, JDBC or MYSQL source tables may contain data types not supported by CONNECT. In this case, CONNECT makes an automatic conversion to a similar supported type when it is possible.
trans-unit.target: 将许多数据类型应用于纯文件时毫无意义。这就是CONNECT仅支持一组受限制的数据类型的原因。但是，ODBC，JDBC或MYSQL源表可能包含CONNECT不支持的数据类型。在这种情况下，CONNECT将尽可能自动转换为类似的受支持类型。

trans-unit.source: Many edge cases are explained, so even an expert may find something useful here.
trans-unit.target: 解释了许多边缘案例,所以即使是专家也可能在这里找到有用的东西。

trans-unit.source: Many of the options supported by mysqld_safe are identical to options supported by mysqld. If an unknown option is provided to mysqld_safe on the command-line, then it is passed to mysqld.
trans-unit.target: mysqld_safe 支持的许多选项与 mysqld 支持的选项相同。如果在命令行上为 mysqld_safe 提供了未知选项，则将其传递给 mysqld 。

trans-unit.source: Many other malloc replacement libraries (as well as heap debuggers and profilers) can be used with MariaDB in a similar fashion.
trans-unit.target: 许多其他的malloc替换库(以及堆调试器和剖析器)可以以类似的方式与MariaDB一起使用。

trans-unit.source: Many source data files are formatted with variable length fields and records. The simplest format, known as CSV (Comma Separated Variables), has column fields separated by a separator character. By default, the separator is a comma but can be specified by the SEP_CHAR option as any character, for instance a semi-colon.
trans-unit.target: 许多源数据文件使用可变长度的字段和记录进行格式化。最简单的格式称为 CSV （逗号分隔变量），其列字段由分隔符分隔。默认情况下，分隔符是逗号，但可以由 SEP_CHAR 选项指定为任何字符，例如分号。

trans-unit.source: Many tables use a numeric ID field as a primary key. The AUTO_INCREMENT attribute can be used to generate a unique identity for new rows, and is commonly-used with primary keys.
trans-unit.target: 许多表使用数字ID字段作为主键。的AUTO_INCREMENT属性可用于产生新的行的唯一的身份，并与主键是常用的。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB (and also MySQL) allows different versions of the product to co-exist on the same machine, as long as these versions are different either in major or minor version numbers. For example, it is possible to have say MariaDB 5.1.51 and 5.2.6 to be installed on the same machine.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB（以及MySQL）允许产品的不同版本共存于同一台计算机上，只要这些版本的主版本号或次版本号不同即可。例如，可以说MariaDB 5.1.51和5.2.6安装在同一台计算机上。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB (and most other DBMSs) supports rollback of SQL-data change statements, but not of SQL-Schema statements. This means that if you use any of CREATE, ALTER, DROP, GRANT, REVOKE, you are implicitly committing at execution time.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB（和大多数其他DBMS）支持回滚SQL数据更改语句，但不回滚SQL-Schema语句。这意味着，如果您使用 CREATE ， ALTER ， DROP ， GRANT ， REVOKE 之一，那么您将在执行时隐式提交。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB AMIs (Amazon Machine Images) are also available in the AWS Marketplace. These AMIs, kept up-to-date with the most recently released versions of MariaDB, are a great way to try out the newest MariaDB versions before they make it to RDS and/or to use MariaDB in a more traditional server environment. See the MariaDB on Amazon AWS page for more details.
trans-unit.target: 在AWS Marketplace中也可以使用MariaDB AMI（Amazon机器映像）。这些AMI与最新发布的MariaDB版本保持最新，是在将最新的MariaDB版本加入RDS和/或在更传统的服务器环境中使用MariaDB之前试用最新的MariaDB版本的好方法。有关更多详细信息，请参阅Amazon AWS上的MariaDB页面。

MariaDB ColumnStore DBRM files: This is where the Extent Map and Versioning files are located. These make up the DBRM files. There are 3 copies of the files that are keep, one is the current active set and the other 2 are the backup. The current active copy file name is located in this file:
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore DBRM文件。这是Extent Map和Versioning文件所在的地方。这些构成了DBRM文件。这些文件有3个副本,其中一个是当前的活动集,另外两个是备份。当前活动副本文件名就在这个文件中。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore Data Adapters
MariaDB ColumnStore Data Adapters Packages
MariaDB ColumnStore Data-Adapters
MariaDB ColumnStore Database - /usr/local/mariadb/columnstore/dataX/000.dir

MariaDB ColumnStore Database: The X represents the DBroot ID #. DBroot is the file directory containing the meta-data. We generally assign 1 DBroot per Performance Module. This DBroot can be pointing to local disk storage area or mounted to external disk. So for a single-server setup, we would have ‘data1’ as the dbroot. If we had a system will 2 Performance modules, then we would have ‘data1’ on PM1 and ‘data2’ on PM2.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore数据库：X表示DBroot ID＃。DBroot是包含元数据的文件目录。我们通常为每个性能模块分配1个DBroot。该DBroot可以指向本地磁盘存储区域，也可以挂载到外部磁盘。因此，对于单服务器设置，我们将'data1'作为dbroot。如果我们有一个系统将包含2个Performance模块，那么我们在PM1上将有“ data1”，在PM2上将有“ data2”。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore Exporter

MariaDB ColumnStore Information Functions are selectable pseudo functions that return MariaDB ColumnStore specific “meta” information to ensure queries can be locally directed to a specific node. These functions can be specified in the projection (SELECT), WHERE, GROUP BY, HAVING and ORDER BY portions of the SQL statement and will be processed in a distributed manner.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore信息函数是可选的伪函数，它们返回MariaDB ColumnStore特定的“元”信息，以确保查询可以本地定向到特定节点。这些函数可以在SQL语句的投影（SELECT），WHERE，GROUP BY，HAVING和ORDER BY部分中指定，并将以分布式方式进行处理。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore alias commands
MariaDB ColumnStore aliases

MariaDB ColumnStore allows columnstore tables to be joined with non-columnstore tables (e.g. MyISAM tables) within a query. The non-columnstore table may be on the MariaDB ColumnStore system OR on an external server that supports MariaDB client connections.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore允许在查询中将列存储表与非列存储表（例如MyISAM表）结合在一起。非列存储表可以位于MariaDB ColumnStore系统上，也可以位于支持MariaDB客户端连接的外部服务器上。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore allows columnstore tables to be joined with non-columnstore tables (e.g. InnoDB tables) within a query. The standard configuration is to process these on the local User Module where the request was made. So the Automatic Query Round-Robin Distribution functionality doesn't apply to this type of queries.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore允许在查询中把columnstore表和非columnstore表(例如InnoDB表)连接起来。标准配置是在提出请求的本地用户模块上处理这些。所以自动查询循环分配功能并不适用于这种类型的查询。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore allows permissions to be set for user accounts. The syntax of these grants follows the standard MariaDB syntax (see GRANT).
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore允许为用户帐户设置权限。这些授予的语法遵循标准的MariaDB语法（请参阅GRANT）。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore automatically creates logical horizontal partitions across every column. For ordered or semi-ordered data fields such as an order date this will result in a highly effective partitioning scheme based on that column. This allows for increased performance of queries filtering on that column since partition elimination can be performed. It also allows for data lifecycle management as data can be disabled or dropped by partition cheaply. Caution should be used when disabling or dropping partitions as these commands are destructive.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore会自动在每一列上创建逻辑的水平分区。对于有序或半有序的数据字段,如订单日期,这将导致基于该列的高效分区方案。由于可以进行分区消除,因此可以提高对该列进行过滤查询的性能。它还允许进行数据生命周期管理,因为可以廉价地按分区禁用或放弃数据。在禁用或丢弃分区时应谨慎,因为这些命令具有破坏性。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore can be installed in different user configurations.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore可以安装在不同的用户配置中。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore can be used a Single Node or a Multi-Node system in the Google Cloud environment. You would follow the setup procedure from the Setup document. This document shows how to set Google Cloud Instances.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore可以在Google Cloud环境中使用单节点或多节点系统。您将按照设置文档中的设置步骤进行设置。本文档介绍了如何设置Google Cloud Instances。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore can be used a Single Node or a Multi-Node system. And it supports using both local storage and EBS storage's.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore可以作为单节点或多节点系统使用,并且支持使用本地存储和EBS存储。而且它支持使用本地存储和EBS存储。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore can use the following standard logging systems.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore可以使用以下标准日志系统。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore configuration file, my.cnf
MariaDB ColumnStore database files
MariaDB ColumnStore database user management

MariaDB ColumnStore has four Information Schema tables that expose information about the table and column storage. These tables were added in version 1.0.5 of ColumnStore and were heavily modified for 1.0.6.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore有四个信息模式表,暴露了表和列存储的信息。这些表是在ColumnStore的1.0.5版本中添加的,并在1.0.6中进行了大量修改。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore has it's own query optimizer and execution engine distinct from the MariaDB server implementation. This allows for scaling out query execution to multiple PM servers and to optimize for handling data stored as columns rather than rows. As such the factors influencing query performance are very different:
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore有自己的查询优化器和执行引擎,与MariaDB服务器的实现不同。这允许将查询执行扩展到多个PM服务器,并优化处理存储为列而非行的数据。因此,影响查询性能的因素是非常不同的。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore has the ability to change intermediate decimal mathematical results from decimal type to double. The decimal type has approximately 17-18 digits of precision, but a smaller maximum range. Whereas the double type has approximately 15-16 digits of precision, but a much larger maximum range. In typical mathematical and scientific applications, the ability to avoid overflow in intermediate results with double math is likely more beneficial than the additional two digits of precisions. In banking applications, however, it may be more appropriate to leave in the default decimal setting to ensure accuracy to the least significant digit.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore具有将中间小数数学结果从十进制类型改为双数的功能。十进制类型的精度约为17-18位,但最大范围较小。而双数型的精度大约为15-16位,但最大范围更大。在典型的数学和科学应用中,使用双数型数学能够避免中间结果的溢出,这可能比额外的两位数精度更有利。然而,在银行应用中,保留默认的十进制设置以确保精确到最小有效数字可能更合适。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore has the ability to compress data and this is controlled through a compression mode. This compression mode may be set as a default for the instance or set at the session level.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore具有压缩数据的能力,这通过压缩模式来控制。这个压缩模式可以设置为实例的默认模式,也可以在会话级别设置。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore has the ability to query data from just a single PM instead of the whole database through the UM. In order to accomplish this, the infinidb_local_query variable in the my.cnf configuration file is used and maybe set as a default at system wide or set at the session level.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore能够从单个PM查询数据，而不是通过UM查询整个数据库。为了实现此目的，使用了my.cnf配置文件中的infinidb_local_query变量，并且可以将其设置为系统范围的默认值或在会话级别设置。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore has the ability to utilize the cpimport fast data import tool for non-transactional LOAD DATA INFILE and INSERT INTO SELECT FROM SQL statements. Using this method results in a significant increase in performance in loading data through these two SQL statements. This optimization is independent of the storage engine used for the tables in the select statement.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore能够将cpimport快速数据导入工具用于非事务性LOAD DATA INFILE和INSERT INTO SELECT FROM SQL语句。使用此方法可显着提高通过这两个SQL语句加载数据的性能。此优化独立于用于select语句中的表的存储引擎。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore is a columnar storage engine designed for distributed massively parallel processing (MPP), such as for big data analysis. Deployments are composed of several MariaDB servers, operating as modules, working together to provide linear scalability and exceptional performance with real-time response to analytical queries. These modules include User, Performance and Storage.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore是专为分布式大规模并行处理（MPP）（例如用于大数据分析）而设计的列式存储引擎。部署由作为模块运行的数台MariaDB服务器组成，它们协同工作以提供线性可伸缩性和出色的性能，并对分析查询进行实时响应。这些模块包括用户，性能和存储。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore is a columnar storage engine that utilizes a massively parallel distributed data architecture. It's a columnar storage system built by porting InfiniDB 4.6.7 to MariaDB 10.1 and 10.2. MariaDB ColumnStore, however, is released under the GPL license.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore是使用大规模并行分布式数据架构的列式存储引擎。它是通过将InfiniDB 4.6.7移植到MariaDB 10.1和10.2 来构建的列式存储系统。但是，MariaDB ColumnStore是根据GPL许可发布的。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore is a columnar storage system built by porting InfiniDB 4.6.7 to MariaDB 10.1 and 10.2. It is designed for big data scaling to process petabytes of data, linear scalability and exceptional performance with real-time response to analytical queries. It leverages the I/O benefits of columnar storage, compression, just-in-time projection, and horizontal and vertical partitioning to deliver tremendous performance when analyzing large data sets.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore是通过将InfiniDB 4.6.7移植到MariaDB 10.1和10.2 构建的列式存储系统。它专为大数据扩展而设计，可处理PB级数据，线性可伸缩性和出色的性能，并能对分析查询进行实时响应。它利用列存储，压缩，即时投影以及水平和垂直分区的I / O优势，在分析大型数据集时可提供出色的性能。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore is certified to run on:
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore经过认证,可以在以下设备上运行。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore is designed for big data scaling to process petabytes of data, linear scalability and exceptional performance with real-time response to analytical queries. It leverages the I/O benefits of columnar storage, compression, just-in-time projection, and horizontal and vertical partitioning to deliver tremendous performance when analyzing large data sets.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore专为大数据扩展而设计,可处理PB级数据,具有线性可扩展性和卓越性能,可实时响应分析查询。它利用列式存储的I/O优势、压缩、及时投影以及水平和垂直分区,在分析大型数据集时提供巨大的性能。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore is extremely flexible with the storage system. When running on premise, you can use either local storage (that is, the Performance Modules), or shared storage, (for instance, SAN), to store data. With Amazon EC2 environments, you can use ephemeral or Elastic Block Store (EBS) volumes. In situations where data redundancy is required for shared-nothing deployments, you can integrate it with GlusterFS.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore在存储系统方面非常灵活。在内部运行时，可以使用本地存储（即Performance Modules）或共享存储（例如SAN）来存储数据。在Amazon EC2环境中，您可以使用临时卷或弹性块存储（EBS）卷。在无共享部署中需要数据冗余的情况下，可以将其与GlusterFS集成。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore is installed by an unprivileged user and the MariaDB ColumnStore commands are run by that user. With this installation type, you are required to install using the binary tarball, which can be downloaded from the MariaDB ColumnStore Downloads page: https://mariadb.com/downloads/#mariadbax
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore由非特权用户安装，MariaDB ColumnStore命令由该用户运行。对于这种安装类型，您需要使用二进制tarball进行安装，该二进制tarball可以从MariaDB ColumnStore下载页面下载：https : //mariadb.com/downloads/#mariadbax

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore is installed by root and the MariaDB ColumnStore commands are run by root. With this installation type, you have the option of install using rpm, deb or binary packages. You can install the packages with the standard tools yum, apt, or zypper.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore由root安装,MariaDB ColumnStore命令由root运行。在这种安装类型下,你可以选择使用rpm、deb或二进制包进行安装。你可以使用标准工具yum、apt或zypper安装包。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore is installed by root user and the MariaDB ColumnStore commands are run by an unprivileged user. This document will show how to configure the system to run commands as an unprivileged user: https://mariadb.com/kb/en/library/mariadb-columnstore-system-usage/#non-root-user-mariadb-columnstore-admin-console
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore由root用户安装，MariaDB ColumnStore命令由非特权用户运行。本文档将展示如何配置系统以非特权用户身份运行命令：https : //mariadb.com/kb/zh-CN/library/mariadb-columnstore-system-usage/#non-root-user-mariadb-columnstore-管理员控制台

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore logging
MariaDB ColumnStore packages can be downloaded from the MariaDB Downloads
trans-unit.target: 可以从MariaDB下载中下载 MariaDB ColumnStore软件包

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore packages which consist of:
MariaDB ColumnStore packages:

MariaDB ColumnStore performs best on filesystems with low overhead, such as the ext family, however it can use any Linux filesystem. ColumnStore writes relatively large files (up to 64MB) compared to other databases, so please take that into account when choosing and configuring your filesystems.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore在低开销的文件系统上表现最好,比如ext系列,但是它可以使用任何Linux文件系统。与其他数据库相比,ColumnStore会写入相对较大的文件(最大64MB),所以在选择和配置文件系统时请考虑到这一点。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore port usage
MariaDB ColumnStore processes an end user query from the user to User and Performance modules.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore处理从用户到用户和性能模块的终端用户查询。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore provides scale out query processing and as such requires a separate distributed implementation of each SQL function. This allows for the function application to happen on each PM server node providing distributed scale out performance.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore提供了规模化的查询处理,因此需要对每个SQL函数进行单独的分布式实现。这使得函数应用发生在每个PM服务器节点上,提供分布式的扩展性能。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore provides support for window functions broadly following the SQL 2003 specification. A window function allows for calculations relating to a window of data surrounding the current row in a result set. This capability provides for simplified queries in support of common business questions such as cumulative totals, rolling averages, and top 10 lists.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore提供了大致遵循SQL 2003规范的窗口函数支持。窗口函数允许对结果集中当前行周围的数据窗口进行相关计算。这种功能提供了简化的查询,以支持常见的业务问题,如累计总数、滚动平均和前10名列表。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore query statistics history can be retrieved for analysis. By default the query stats collection is disabled. To enable the collection of query stats, the <QueryStats><Enabled> element in the ColumnStore.XML configuration file should be set to Y (default is N).
trans-unit.target: 可以检索MariaDB ColumnStore查询统计信息历史记录以进行分析。默认情况下，查询统计信息收集处于禁用状态。要启用查询统计信息的收集，应将ColumnStore.XML配置文件中的<QueryStats> <Enabled>元素设置为Y（默认值为N）。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore requires that the boost package of 1.53 or newer is installed.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore需要安装1.53或更新的boost包。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore software version

MariaDB ColumnStore support Local Performance Module Query where a query can be run locally on a Performance Module when a system is configured to have the User Module and the Performance Module on different servers. In this case, the Performance Module will have the User Module process running like the MariaDB Server Process and ExeMgr. But they are only there to process local queries. There will not process queries as part of the Automatic Query Round-Robin Distribution.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore支持本地性能模块查询,当系统配置为用户模块和性能模块在不同的服务器上时,可以在性能模块上本地运行查询。在这种情况下,性能模块会像MariaDB服务器进程和ExeMgr一样,有用户模块进程运行。但它们只是为了处理本地查询。不会有作为自动查询循环分发的一部分来处理查询。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore supports High Availability failover in the case where a Performance Module was to go down when you are using SAN storage devices. To setup a system to support this, all of the SAN devices would need to be mountable to all of the Performance Modules. So in a system that had 2 Performance Modules and each one had 1 SAN device. If 1 of the Performance Modules was to go offline, the system would automatically detect this and would remount the SAN device from the downed module to the 1 active Performance Module. And the system would be able to continue to perform while the module remain offline.
trans-unit.target: 在使用SAN存储设备时,MariaDB ColumnStore支持高可用性故障转移,当一个性能模块出现故障时,MariaDB ColumnStore支持高可用性故障转移。要设置一个系统来支持这个功能,所有的SAN设备都需要可以挂载到所有的性能模块上。所以在一个系统中,有2个性能模块,每个模块有1个SAN设备。如果其中1个性能模块脱机,系统会自动检测到这一点,并将SAN设备从脱机模块重新挂载到1个激活的性能模块上。当模块处于离线状态时,系统将能够继续执行。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore supports being able to configure with different Storage options.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore支持能够用不同的存储选项进行配置。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore supports logging committed transaction to the server's Binary Log.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore支持将已提交的事务记录到服务器的Binary Log中。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore supports many storage options.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore支持多种存储方式。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore supports the ability to give priority to resources allocated (CPU) based on a user. Users are allocated at least the % of CPU that they are assigned to by priority setting. Effectively a particular user or a set of users can be guaranteed a set amount of resources. E.g:
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore支持基于用户的资源分配(CPU)优先级的功能。通过优先级设置,用户至少被分配到CPU的%。实际上可以保证一个特定的用户或一组用户获得一定的资源。例如

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore supports the following aggregate functions, these can b...
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore支持以下的聚合函数,这些函数可以在MariaDB ColumnStore中使用。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore supports the following aggregate functions, these can be used in the SELECT, HAVING, and ORDER BY clauses of the SQL statement.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore支持以下聚合函数,这些函数可以在SQL语句的SELECT、HAVING和ORDER BY子句中使用。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore supports user defined function implementations in C/C++. User defined aggregate and window functions are not supported in ColumnStore 1.0.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore支持用户在C/C++中定义函数的实现。ColumnStore 1.0中不支持用户定义的聚合和窗口函数。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore uses the Version Buffer to store disk blocks that are being modified, manage transaction rollbacks, and service the MVCC (multi-version concurrency control) or "snapshot read" function of the database. This allows it to offer a query consistent view of the database.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore使用版本缓冲区来存储正在修改的磁盘块,管理事务回滚,并为数据库的MVCC(多版本并发控制)或 "快照读取 "功能提供服务。这使得它能够提供数据库的查询一致性视图。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore utilities
MariaDB ColumnStore utilizes the System Logging applications for generating logs. So one of the below system logging applications should be install on all servers in the ColumnStore system:
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore利用系统日志应用程序来生成日志。所以在ColumnStore系统中的所有服务器上都应该安装下面的一个系统日志应用程序。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore utilizes the install system logging tool, whether its syslog, rsyslog, or syslog-ng. The logs are located in /var/log/mariadb/columnstore. There are these 5 logs:
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore利用安装系统日志工具,无论是syslog、rsyslog还是syslog-ng。日志位于/var/log/mariadb/columnstore中。有这5个日志。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore utilizing the same Standard Replication that is used in the MariaDB Server application though the use of binlogs.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore通过使用binlogs,利用与MariaDB Server应用程序相同的标准复制。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ColumnStore variables

MariaDB ColumnStore will run on most Linux filesystems, but we test most heavily with EXT2. You should have no problems with EXT3 or EXT4, but the journaling in these filesystems can be expensive for a database application. You should carefully evaluate the write characteristics of your chosen filesystem to make sure they meet your specific business needs. In any event, MariaDB ColumnStore writes relatively few, very large (64MB) files. You should consult with your Linux system administrator to see if configuring a larger bytes-per-inode setting than the default is available in your chosen filesystem.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB ColumnStore可以在大多数Linux文件系统上运行,但我们最主要的测试是在EXT2上。你在EXT3或EXT4中应该没有问题,但这些文件系统中的日志对数据库应用来说可能很昂贵。你应该仔细评估你所选择的文件系统的写入特性,以确保它们满足你的特定业务需求。在任何情况下,MariaDB ColumnStore写入的文件相对较少,非常大(64MB)。你应该咨询你的Linux系统管理员,看看在你选择的文件系统中是否可以配置比默认值更大的每节点字节设置。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB Columnstore Memory Configuration

MariaDB Columnstore System Configuration and Installation tool, 'postConfigure', will Configure the MariaDB Columnstore System and will perform a Package Installation of all of the Servers within the System that is being configured. It will prompt the user to configuration information like server, storage, MariaDB Server, and system features. It updates the MariaDB Columnstore System Configuration File, Columnstore.xml. At the end, it will start up the ColumnStore system.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB Columnstore系统配置和安装工具'postConfigure'将对MariaDB Columnstore系统进行配置,并对系统内所有正在配置的服务器进行包安装。它将提示用户配置信息,如服务器、存储、MariaDB服务器和系统功能。它将更新MariaDB Columnstore系统配置文件Columnstore.xml。最后,它将启动ColumnStore系统。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB Columnstore System Configuration and Installation tool, 'postConfigure', will Configure the MariaDB Columnstore System and will perform a Package Installation of all of the Servers within the System that is being configured. It will prompt the user to for information like IP addresses, storage types, MariaDB Server, and system features. At the end, it will start the ColumnStore system.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB Columnstore系统配置和安装工具'postConfigure'将配置MariaDB Columnstore系统,并对系统内所有正在配置的服务器进行包安装。它将提示用户提供IP地址、存储类型、MariaDB服务器和系统功能等信息。最后,它将启动ColumnStore系统。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB Columnstore System Configuration and Installation tool, 'postConfigure', will Configure the MariaDB Columnstore System and will perform a package Installation of all of the servers within the system that is being configured. It will prompt the user to configuration information like server, storage, and system features. It updates the MariaDB Columnstore System Configuration File, Columnstore.xml. It will also execute MariaDB Server setup scripts on server where User Module Functionality will be. At the end, it will start up the ColumnStore system.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB Columnstore系统配置和安装工具'postConfigure'将对MariaDB Columnstore系统进行配置,并对系统内所有被配置的服务器进行打包安装。它会提示用户服务器、存储、系统功能等配置信息。它将更新MariaDB Columnstore系统配置文件Columnstore.xml。它还会在用户模块功能所在的服务器上执行MariaDB服务器设置脚本。最后,它将启动ColumnStore系统。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB Columnstore System Configuration settings

MariaDB Columnstore can be installed to run as a non-root user using the binary tar file installation. These procedures will also allow you to change the installation from the default install directory into a user-specified directory. These procedures will need to be run on all the MariaDB ColumnStore Servers.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB Columnstore可以使用二进制tar文件安装,以非root用户的身份运行。这些程序也将允许你把安装从默认的安装目录改为用户指定的目录。这些程序需要在所有的MariaDB ColumnStore服务器上运行。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB Columnstore can be installed to run as an unprivileged user using the binary package. This procedure will allow you to change the location of the installation. It will need to be run on all MariaDB ColumnStore nodes.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB Columnstore可以使用二进制包安装成非特权用户运行。这个过程将允许你改变安装的位置。它需要在所有MariaDB ColumnStore节点上运行。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB Columnstore has the ability to support UTF-8 character sets. This profile may be set as a default for the instance or set at the session level.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB Columnstore有能力支持UTF-8字符集。这个配置文件可以设置为实例的默认值,也可以在会话级别设置。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB Columnstore installation (by non-root user)
MariaDB Columnstore installation (by the new user)
trans-unit.target: MariaDB Columnstore的安装(由新用户安装)

trans-unit.source: MariaDB Columnstore is installed to run as an unprivileged user using the binary package. It will need to be run on all MariaDB ColumnStore nodes.
trans-unit.target: 安装MariaDB Columnstore是为了使用二进制包作为非特权用户运行。它需要在所有MariaDB ColumnStore节点上运行。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB Columnstore requires that the software gets installed and the data paths in the configuration files don't get changed from their initial settings. The system will not function properly if they are changed or the software is install in the incorrect places.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB Columnstore要求软件安装好后,配置文件中的数据路径不能从初始设置中改变。如果它们被改变或软件安装在不正确的地方,系统将无法正常运行。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB Columnstore supports User Module Replication. This will synchronize the the User Module data, which consist of the MariaDB Columnstore Database Schemas and the non-columnstore engine schemas and data. When enabled, it will synchronize the data from the Master Data Replication module, default is User Module 1, to all of the other User Modules including the Local Performance Modules. It uses the standard MySQL Data replication functionality to do this from the MariaDB Server Process.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB Columnstore支持用户模块复制。这将同步用户模块的数据,包括MariaDB Columnstore数据库模式和非columnstore引擎模式和数据,当启用时,它将同步主数据复制模块的数据,默认是用户模块1,到所有其他用户模块,包括本地性能模块。当启用时,它将从主数据复制模块(默认为用户模块1)同步数据到所有其他用户模块,包括本地性能模块。它使用标准的MySQL数据复制功能,从MariaDB服务器进程中完成这项工作。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB Columnstore usernames
MariaDB Columnstore will setup and log using your current system logging application in the directory /var/log/mariadb/columnstore.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB Columnstore将在/var/log/mariadb/columnstore目录下使用你当前的系统日志应用程序进行设置和记录。

MariaDB Corporation provides a MariaDB Package Repository for several Linux distributions that use apt to manage packages. This repository contains software packages related to MariaDB Server, including the server itself, clients and utilities, client libraries, plugins, and Mariabackup. The MariaDB Package Repository setup script automatically configures your system to install packages from the MariaDB Package Repository.

MariaDB Galera Cluster also has a separate package that can be installed on arbitrator nodes. In MariaDB 10.4 and later, the package is called galera-arbitrator-4 In MariaDB 10.3 and before, the package is called galera-arbitrator-3. This package should be installed on whatever node you want to serve as the arbitrator. It can either run on a separate server that is not acting as a cluster node, which is the recommended configuration, or it can run on a server that is also acting as an existing cluster node.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB Galera Cluster还具有一个单独的程序包，可以将其安装在仲裁程序节点上。在MariaDB 10.4和更高版本中，该软件包称为 galera-arbitrator-4 。在MariaDB 10.3和之前版本中，该软件包称为 galera-arbitrator-3 。该程序包应安装在要用作仲裁程序的任何节点上。它既可以在不充当群集节点的单独服务器上运行（这是建议的配置），也可以在还充当现有群集节点的服务器上运行。

MariaDB Server 10.1 introduces robust, full instance, at-rest encryption. This feature uses a flexible plugin interface to allow actual encryption to be done using a key management approach that meets the customer's needs. MariaDB Server, starting with MariaDB 10.2, includes a plugin that uses the Amazon Web Services (AWS) Key Management Service (KMS) to facilitate separation of responsibilities and remote logging & auditing of key access requests.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB Server 10.1引入了健壮的完整实例静态加密。此功能使用灵活的插件界面，可以使用满足客户需求的密钥管理方法来进行实际的加密。从MariaDB 10.2开始，MariaDB Server 包括一个插件，该插件使用Amazon Web Services（AWS）密钥管理服务（KMS）来促进职责分离以及密钥访问请求的远程日志记录和审计。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB advantage in delivering enterprise-level high availability, scalability and security.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB在提供企业级高可用性、可扩展性和安全性方面的优势。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB allows server variables in generated column expressions, including those that change dynamically, such as warning_count.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB允许在生成的列表达式中使用服务器变量，包括动态更改的变量，例如 warning_count 。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB allows FLOAT expressions to be used in generated columns. Microsoft SQL Server considers these expressions to be "imprecise" due to potential cross-platform differences in floating-point implementations and precision.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB允许在生成的列中使用 FLOAT 表达式。由于浮点实现和精度方面可能存在跨平台差异，Microsoft SQL Server认为这些表达式“不精确”。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB allows for a variety of column data types, characters and collations.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB允许各种列数据类型、字符和整理。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB allows routines to contain DDL statements, such as CREATE and DROP. MariaDB also allows stored procedures (but not stored functions) to contain SQL transaction statements such as COMMIT.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB允许例程包含DDL语句，例如 CREATE 和DROP。MariaDB还允许存储过程（但不能存储函数）包含SQL事务语句，例如 COMMIT 。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB allows the CAST() function to be used with non-unicode character sets, even though character sets are configurable and differ between binaries/versions.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB允许 CAST() 函数与非Unicode 字符集一起使用，即使字符集是可配置的并且在二进制文件/版本之间也不同。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB allows the CONVERT_TZ() function to be called with a named time zone as an argument, even though time zone names and time offsets are configurable.
trans-unit.target: 即使时区名称和时间偏移是可配置的，MariaDB也允许使用命名时区作为参数来调用 CONVERT_TZ() 函数。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB allows the column name to be used on its own if the reference will be unambiguous, or the table name to be used with the column name, or all three of the database, table and column names. A period is used to separate the identifiers, and the period can be surrounded by spaces.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB允许在引用将毫不含糊的情况下单独使用列名,或者将表名与列名一起使用,或者将数据库、表和列名三者全部使用。句号用来分隔标识符,句号可以用空格包围。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB allows the user to configure flexibly what to encrypt. In XtraDB or InnoDB, one can choose to encrypt:
trans-unit.target: MariaDB允许用户灵活配置加密的内容。在XtraDB或InnoDB中,可以选择加密。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB allows you to configure an extra port for administrative connections. This is primarily intended to be used in situations where all threads in the thread pool are blocked, and you still need a way to access the server. However, it can also be used to ensure that monitoring systems (including MaxScale's monitors) always have access to the system, even when all connections on the main port are used. This extra port uses the old one-thread-per-connection thread handling.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB允许您为管理连接配置额外的端口。这主要用于在线程池中的所有线程都被阻塞的情况下使用，您仍然需要一种访问服务器的方法。但是，即使使用主端口上的所有连接，它也可以用于确保监视系统（包括MaxScale的监视器）始终可以访问该系统。这个额外的端口使用旧 one-thread-per-connection 线程”线程处理。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB also creates temporary files on disk. For example, a binary log cache will be written to a temporary file if the binary log cache exceeds binlog_cache_size or binlog_stmt_cache_size, and temporary files are also often used for filesorts during query execution. Since MariaDB 10.1.5, these temporary files can also be encrypted if encrypt_tmp_files=ON is set.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB还在磁盘上创建临时文件。例如，如果二进制日志缓存超过 binlog_cache_size 或 binlog_stmt_cache_size ，则二进制日志缓存将写入临时文件，并且在查询执行期间临时文件也经常用于文件排序。从MariaDB 10.1.5开始，如果设置了crypto_tmp_files = ON，也可以对这些临时文件进行加密。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB also does not currently support time zone literals that contain time zone identifiers. See MDEV-11829 for more information.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB当前还不支持包含时区标识符的时区文字。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-11829。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB also has special behavior if NULL is assigned to column that uses the TIMESTAMP data type. If the column is assigned the NULL value in an INSERT or UPDATE query, then MariaDB will automatically initialize the column's value with the current date and time. For details, see NULL values in MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: 如果将 NULL 分配给使用 TIMESTAMP 数据类型的列，MariaDB也具有特殊的行为。如果在 INSERT 或 UPDATE 查询中为该列分配了 NULL 值，则MariaDB将使用当前日期和时间自动初始化该列的值。有关详细信息，请参见MariaDB中的NULL值。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB also issues this warning for some classes of statements that are safe.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB也会对一些安全的语句类发出这个警告。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB also supports '0000-00-00' as a special zero-date value, unless NO_ZERO_DATE is specified in the SQL_MODE. Similarly, individual components of a date can be set to 0 (for example: '2015-00-12'), unless NO_ZERO_DATE is specified in the SQL_MODE. In many cases, the result of en expression involving a zero-date, or a date with zero-parts, is NULL. If the ALLOW_INVALID_DATES SQL_MODE is enabled, if the day part is in the range between 1 and 31, the date does not produce any error, even for months that have less than 31 days.
trans-unit.target: 除非在 NO_ZERO_DATE 中指定了 SQL_MODE ，MariaDB还支持将' 0000-00-00 '作为特殊的零日期值。同样，除非在 NO_ZERO_DATE 中指定了 SQL_MODE ，否则日期的各个组成部分都可以设置为 0 （例如：' 2015-00-12 '）。在许多情况下，包含零日期或零部分日期的en表达式的结果为 NULL 。如果启用了 ALLOW_INVALID_DATES SQL_MODE，则如果日期部分在1到31之间，则即使对于少于31天的月份，日期也不会产生任何错误。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB also supports the use of alternative authentication plugins. When the plugin column is not empty for the given account, MariaDB uses it to authenticate connection attempts. The specific plugin then uses the value of either the Password column or the authentication_string column to authenticate the user.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB还支持使用替代身份验证插件。当给定帐户的 plugin 列不为空时，MariaDB使用它来认证连接尝试。然后，特定的插件使用“ Password 列或“ authentication_string ”列的值来认证用户。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB always writes its error log, but the destination is configurable.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB总是写入其错误日志,但目标是可配置的。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB and MySQL are used in a broad range of environments, but if you needed to record user access to be in compliance with auditing regulations for your organization, you would previously have had to use other database solutions. To meet this need, though, MariaDB has developed the MariaDB Audit Plugin. Although the MariaDB Audit Plugin has some unique features available only for MariaDB, it can be used also with MySQL.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB和MySQL被广泛应用于各种环境中,但如果你需要记录用户的访问情况,以符合组织的审计规定,以前你不得不使用其他数据库解决方案。不过为了满足这一需求,MariaDB开发了MariaDB Audit Plugin。虽然MariaDB Audit Plugin具有一些仅适用于MariaDB的独特功能,但它也可以与MySQL一起使用。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB and MySQL can optimize the MIN() and MAX() functions to be a single row lookup in the following cases:

trans-unit.source: MariaDB and MySQL database backend

MariaDB and MySQL support loose index scan, which can speed up certain GROUP BY queries. The basic idea is that when scanning a BTREE index (the most common index type for the MariaDB storage engines) we can jump over identical values for any prefix of a key and thus speed up the scan significantly.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB和MySQL支持松散索引扫描，这可以加快某些 GROUP BY 查询的速度。基本思想是，在扫描 BTREE 索引（MariaDB存储引擎最常见的索引类型）时，我们可以跳过键的任何前缀的相同值，从而显着加快扫描速度。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB and MySQL-specific table options, column options, and index options are not included in the output of this statement if the NO_TABLE_OPTIONS, NO_FIELD_OPTIONS and NO_KEY_OPTIONSSQL_MODE flags are used.
trans-unit.target: 如果使用 NO_TABLE_OPTIONS ， NO_FIELD_OPTIONS 和 NO_KEY_OPTIONS SQL_MODE标志，则此语句的输出中不包括MariaDB和MySQL特定的表选项，列选项和索引选项。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB audit plugin

MariaDB binaries built with the Schannel library support different versions of TLS on different versions of Windows. See the Protocols in TLS/SSL (Schannel SSP) documentation from Microsoft to determine which versions of TLS are supported on each version of Windows.
trans-unit.target: 使用Schannel库构建的MariaDB二进制文件在不同版本的Windows上支持不同版本的TLS。请参阅Microsoft的TLS / SSL协议（Schannel SSP）文档，以确定每种Windows版本都支持哪些TLS版本。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB binaries built with the GnuTLS library support TLSv1.0, TLSv1.1, TLSv1.2, and TLSv1.3.

trans-unit.source: MariaDB binaries built with the OpenSSL library (OpenSSL 1.0.1 or later) support TLSv1.1 and TLSv1.2 since MariaDB 5.5.41, MariaDB 10.0.15, and MariaDB 10.1.4.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 5.5.41，MariaDB 10.0.15和MariaDB 10.1.4 开始，使用OpenSSL库（OpenSSL 1.0.1或更高版本）构建的MariaDB二进制文件支持TLSv1.1和TLSv1.2 。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB binaries built with the OpenSSL library (OpenSSL 1.1.1 or later) support TLSv1.3 since MariaDB 10.2.16 and MariaDB 10.3.8.
trans-unit.target: 从MariaDB 10.2.16和MariaDB 10.3.8开始，使用OpenSSL库（OpenSSL 1.1.1或更高版本）构建的MariaDB二进制文件支持TLSv1.3 。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB binaries built with the bundled wolfSSL library support TLSv1.0, TLSv1.1, TLSv1.2, and TLSv1.3.
trans-unit.target: 使用捆绑的wolfSSL库构建的MariaDB二进制文件支持TLSv1.0，TLSv1.1，TLSv1.2和TLSv1.3。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB binaries built with the bundled yaSSL library support SSLv3.0, TLSv1.0, and TLSv1.1.
trans-unit.target: 使用捆绑的yaSSL库构建的MariaDB二进制文件支持SSLv3.0，TLSv1.0和TLSv1.1。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB binaries from .deb packages provided by Debian's and Ubuntu's default repositories are linked with a different TLS library than MariaDB binaries from .deb packages provided by MariaDB Foundation's and MariaDB Corporation's repositories.
trans-unit.target: 由Debian和Ubuntu的默认存储库提供的 .deb 软件包中的MariaDB二进制文件与与由MariaDB Foundation和MariaDB Corporation的存储库提供的 .deb 软件包中的MariaDB二进制文件不同的TLS库链接。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB binary types (BINARY, VARBINARY or BLOB)
MariaDB builds optionally support authenticode code signing with an optional parameter SIGNCODE. Use cmake -DSIGNCODE=1 during the configuration step to sign the binaries in the ZIP and MSI packages.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB使用可选参数 SIGNCODE 构建可选的支持Authenticode代码签名。在配置步骤中，使用 cmake -DSIGNCODE=1 对 ZIP 和 MSI 软件包中的二进制文件进行签名。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB builds with readline; using an alternative such as Editline may result in problems with non-ascii symbols.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB使用 readline 构建；使用诸如 Editline 之类的替代方法可能会导致非ascii符号出现问题。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB calculates a relevance for each result, based on a number of factors, including the number of words in the index, the number of unique words in a row, the total number of words in both the index and the result, and the weight of the word. In English, 'cool' will be weighted less than 'dandy', at least at present! The relevance can be returned as part of a query simply by using the MATCH function in the field list.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB根据索引中的词数、一行中的唯一词数、索引和结果中的总词数以及词的权重等多个因素,计算出每个结果的相关性。在英语中,'cool'的权重会低于'dandy',至少目前是这样! 只需使用字段列表中的MATCH函数,就可以将相关性作为查询的一部分返回。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB can also store microseconds with a precision between 0 and 6. If no microsecond precision is specified, then 0 is used by default.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB还可以以0到6之间的精度存储微秒。如果未指定微秒精度，则默认使用0。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB can encrypt data in tables that use the Aria storage engine. This includes both user-created tables and internal on-disk temporary tables that use the Aria storage engine. This ensures that your Aria data is only accessible through MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB可以加密使用Aria存储引擎的表中的数据。这既包括用户创建的表，也包括使用Aria存储引擎的内部磁盘临时表。这样可以确保只能通过MariaDB访问Aria数据。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB can keep a number of log files, including the error log, the binary log, the general query log and the slow query log.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB可以保存一些日志文件,包括错误日志、二进制日志、一般查询日志和慢速查询日志。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB comes pre-installed with a system database called mysql containing many important tables storing, in particular, grant and privilege information. Until MariaDB 10.4, system tables used the MyISAM storage engine. From MariaDB 10.4, they use Aria.

trans-unit.source: MariaDB contains many new options and optimizations which, for compatibility or other reasons, are not enabled in the default install. Enabling them helps you gain extra performance from the same hardware when upgrading from MySQL to MariaDB. This article contains information on options and settings which you should enable, or at least look in to, when making the switch.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB包含许多新的选项和优化,出于兼容性或其他原因,这些选项和优化在默认安装中没有启用。当你从MySQL升级到MariaDB时,启用它们可以帮助你从相同的硬件中获得额外的性能。这篇文章包含了一些选项和设置的信息,当你进行转换时,你应该启用这些选项和设置,或者至少看看。

MariaDB displays DATETIME values in 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.ffffff' format, but allows assignment of values to DATETIME columns using either strings or numbers. For details, see date and time literals.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 以' YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS.ffffff '格式显示 DATETIME 值，但允许使用字符串或数字将值分配给 DATETIME 列。有关详细信息，请参见日期和时间文字。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB displays TIME values in 'HH:MM:SS.ssssss' format, but allows assignment of times in looser formats, including 'D HH:MM:SS', 'HH:MM:SS', 'HH:MM', 'D HH:MM', 'D HH', 'SS', or 'HHMMSS', as well as permitting dropping of any leading zeros when a delimiter is provided, for example '3:9:10'. For details, see date and time literals.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 以 'HH:MM:SS.ssssss' 格式显示 TIME 值，但允许以更宽松的格式分配时间，包括'D HH：MM：SS'，'HH：MM：SS'，'HH：MM'，' D HH：MM”，“ D HH”，“ SS”或“ HHMMSS”，以及在提供分隔符（例如“ 3：9：10”）时允许丢弃任何前导零。有关详细信息，请参见日期和时间文字。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB does not support this. The passwords in MySQL's .mylogin.cnf are only obfuscated, rather than encrypted, so the feature does not really add much from a security perspective. It is more likely to give users a false sense of security, rather than to seriously protect them.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB不支持此功能。MySQL的 .mylogin.cnf 中的密码仅是模糊的，而不是加密的，因此从安全角度来看，此功能实际上并没有增加太多。它更可能给用户一种错误的安全感，而不是认真地保护他们。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB doesn't evaluate expensive subqueries when doing optimization (this means, EXPLAIN is always fast). MySQL 5.6 has made a progress in this regard but its optimizer will still evaluate certain kinds of subqueries (for example, scalar-context subqueries used in range predicates)
trans-unit.target: MariaDB在做优化时,不会评估昂贵的子查询(这意味着,EXPLAIN总是很快)。MySQL 5.6在这方面取得了进步,但它的优化器仍然会评估某些种类的子查询(例如,范围谓词中使用的标量上下文子查询)。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB enables client sessions to acquire table locks explicitly for the purpose of cooperating with other sessions for access to tables, or to prevent other sessions from modifying tables during periods when a session requires exclusive access to them. A session can acquire or release locks only for itself. One session cannot acquire locks for another session or release locks held by another session.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB使客户端会话能够显式地获取表锁,以便与其他会话合作访问表,或者在一个会话需要独占表的时期防止其他会话修改表。一个会话只能为自己获取或释放锁。一个会话不能为另一个会话获取锁或释放另一个会话持有的锁。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB encryption is fully supported for the XtraDB and InnoDB storage engines. Encryption is also supported for the Aria storage engine, but only for tables created with ROW_FORMAT=PAGE (the default), and for the binary log (replication log).
trans-unit.target: XtraDB和InnoDB存储引擎完全支持MariaDB加密。Aria存储引擎也支持加密，但仅支持使用 ROW_FORMAT=PAGE 创建的表（默认）和二进制日志（复制日志）。

MariaDB error codes reference list

MariaDB global transaction ID supports having multiple masters active at the same time. Typically this happens with either multi-source replication or multi-master ring setups.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB全局事务ID支持同时拥有多个主站活动。通常这种情况会发生在多源复制或多主环设置中。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB handles NULL values in a special way if the field is an AUTO_INCREMENT, a TIMESTAMP or a virtual column. Inserting a NULL value into a numeric AUTO_INCREMENT column will result in the next number in the auto increment sequence being inserted instead. This technique is frequently used with AUTO_INCREMENT fields, which are left to take care of themselves.
trans-unit.target: 如果字段是AUTO_INCREMENT，TIMESTAMP或虚拟列，MariaDB将以特殊方式处理NULL值。在数字AUTO_INCREMENT列中插入NULL值将导致插入自动递增序列中的下一个数字。该技术经常与AUTO_INCREMENT字段一起使用，这些字段需要您自己照顾。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB has the ability to record table events in the logs—this is not a feature of MySQL. This feature is the only way to log which tables have been accessed through a view, a stored procedure, a stored function, or a trigger. Without this feature, a log entry for a query shows only the view, stored procedure or function used, not the underlying tables. Of course, you could create a custom application to parse each query executed to find the SQL statements used and the tables accessed, but that would be a drain on system resources. Table event logging is much simpler: it adds a line to the log for each table accessed, without any parsing. It includes notes as to whether it was a read or a write.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB能够在日志中记录表事件-这不是MySQL的功能。此功能是记录通过视图，存储过程，存储函数或触发器访问过哪些表的唯一方法。如果没有此功能，则查询的日志条目仅显示视图，存储过程或所使用的函数，而不显示基础表。当然，您可以创建一个自定义应用程序来解析执行的每个查询，以查找所使用的SQL语句和所访问的表，但这会浪费系统资源。表事件日志记录要简单得多：它为访问的每个表在日志中添加了一行，而无需任何解析。它包括有关是读还是写的注释。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB has three MRR counters: Handler_mrr_init, Handler_mrr_extra_rowid_sorts, Handler_mrr_extra_key_sorts, while MySQL has only Handler_mrr_init, and it will only count MRR scans that were used by BKA. MRR scans used by range access are not counted.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB具有三个MRR计数器：Handler_mrr_init， Handler_mrr_extra_rowid_sorts ， Handler_mrr_extra_key_sorts ，而MySQL仅具有 Handler_mrr_init ，它将仅对BKA使用的MRR扫描进行计数。范围访问使用的MRR扫描不计算在内。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB imposes a number of limitations on user-defined functions for security purposes.
trans-unit.target: 为了安全起见,MariaDB对用户定义的函数进行了一些限制。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB imposes a row-size limit of 65,535 bytes for the combined sizes of all columns. If the table contains BLOB or TEXT columns, these only count for 9 - 12 bytes in this calculation, given that their content is stored separately.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB对所有列的合并大小施加了65,535字节的行大小限制。如果表包含BLOB或TEXT列，则这些内容仅占9-12个字节，因为它们的内容是分开存储的。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB improves on row-based replication (see binary log formats) of tables which have no primary key but do have some other index. This is based in part on the original Percona patch "row_based_replication_without_primary_key.patch", with some additional fixes and enhancements.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB改进了不具有主键但具有其他索引的表的基于行的复制（请参阅二进制日志格式）。这部分是基于原始Percona补丁“ row_based_replication_without_primary_key.patch”以及一些其他修复和增强功能。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB improves on row-based replication of tables with no primary key
trans-unit.target: MariaDB改进了无主键表的基于行的复制方式

trans-unit.source: MariaDB in Debian
MariaDB includes a number of functions for dealing with regular expressions.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB包含了许多处理正则表达式的函数。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB installation supports the following properties:
MariaDB instances using one page size cannot use data files or log files from an instance using a different page size.
trans-unit.target: 使用一个页面大小的MariaDB实例不能使用使用不同页面大小实例的数据文件或日志文件。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB integer types (TINYINT, SMALLINT, MEDIUMINT, INT or BIGINT)
MariaDB is a drop in place replacement for MySQL, but you can also install it alongside MySQL
trans-unit.target: MariaDB是MySQL的替代品,但你也可以将它与MySQL一起安装。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB is a drop in place replacement for MySQL, but you can also install it alongside MySQL. (This can be useful, for example, if you want to migrate databases/applications one by one.)
trans-unit.target: MariaDB是MySQL的替代品,但你也可以把它和MySQL一起安装。例如,如果你想逐一迁移数据库/应用程序,这可能会很有用)。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB is a multi-threaded program, which means that different connections concurrently run in different threads. Current versions of MariaDB's pam authentication plugin execute PAM module code in the server address space. This means that any PAM modules used with MariaDB must be safe for multi-threaded environments. Otherwise, if multiple clients try to authenticate with the same PAM module in parallel, undefined behavior can occur. For example, the pam_fprintd PAM module is not safe for multi-threaded environments, and if you use it with MariaDB, you may experience server crashes.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB是一个多线程程序，这意味着不同的连接可以同时在不同的线程中运行。MariaDB的 pam 身份验证插件的当前版本在服务器地址空间中执行PAM模块代码。这意味着与MariaDB一起使用的任何PAM模块对于多线程环境都必须是安全的。否则，如果多个客户端尝试并行使用同一PAM模块进行身份验证，则会发生未定义的行为。例如， pam_fprintd PAM模块在多线程环境中并不安全，如果与MariaDB一起使用，则可能会导致服务器崩溃。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB is able to use Semi-join materialization strategy when the subquery has grouping (other semi-join strategies are not applicable in this case).
trans-unit.target: 当子查询有分组时,MariaDB能够使用Semi-join物质化策略(其他半连接策略不适用于这种情况)。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB is distributed with this plugin included, but it is not enabled by default. On Windows, this plugin is part of the server and has a special checkbox in the installer window. Either way, you need to explicitly install and enable it in order for feedback data to be sent.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB在发布时包含了这个插件,但默认情况下没有启用。在Windows上,这个插件是服务器的一部分,在安装程序窗口中有一个特殊的复选框。无论哪种方式,你都需要明确安装并启用它,以便发送反馈数据。

trans-unit.target: MariaDB是在Gentoo中,所以构建它的步骤是。

trans-unit.target: 通常，通过编辑my.cnf文件来配置MariaDB 。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB is not using Oracle's fix (we believe make_join_select is not the right place to do ORDER BY optimization), but the effect is the same: this case is covered by MariaDB 10.1's optimizer.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB没有使用Oracle的修复程序（我们认为 make_join_select 不是执行ORDER BY优化的正确位置），但是效果是相同的：MariaDB 10.1的优化器涵盖了这种情况。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB is one of the database options available when using Amazon's RDS service.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB是使用Amazon的RDS服务时可选择的数据库之一。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB is operated by a service provider who should not gain access to the sensitive data.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB是由服务提供商操作的,他们不应该获得敏感数据的访问权。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB is reading from or writing to some files (datadir, log files, option files, etc.) located at non-default paths.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB正在从一些位于非默认路径的文件(datadir、日志文件、选项文件等)中读取或写入。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB is started in --skip-name-resolve mode; you must restart it without this switch for this grant to work
trans-unit.target: MariaDB是在--skip-name-resolve模式下启动的;你必须在没有这个开关的情况下重新启动它,这个授权才会生效

trans-unit.source: MariaDB is using a non-default port.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB使用了一个非默认的端口。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB is using a plugin that requires access to resources that default installations do not use.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB使用的是一个插件,需要访问默认安装不使用的资源。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB keeps track of each encryption key internally using a 32-bit integer, which serves as the key identifier. Unlike InnoDB, Aria does not support the ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID table option (for more information, see MDEV-18049), which allows the user to specify the encryption key to use. Instead, Aria defaults to specific encryption keys provided by the Encryption Key Management plugin.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB使用32位整数（用作密钥标识符）在内部跟踪每个加密密钥。与InnoDB不同，Aria不支持 ENCRYPTION_KEY_ID 表选项（有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-18049），该选项允许用户指定要使用的加密密钥。而是，Aria默认使用由加密密钥管理插件提供的特定加密密钥。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB keeps track of several time zone settings.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB会跟踪几个时区的设置。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB makes heavy use of the average group size statistic. For example, if there are 100 rows, and twenty groups with the same index values, the average group size would be five.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB大量使用平均组大小统计。例如,如果有100行,20个组的索引值相同,那么平均组大小就是5个。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB makes use of a number of buffering, caching and threading techniques to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB利用一些缓冲、缓存和线程技术来提高性能。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB makes use of numerous environment variables that may be set on your system. Environment variables have the lowest precedence, so any options set on the command line or in an option file will take precedence.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB使用了许多可以在系统上设置的环境变量。环境变量的优先级最低,所以任何在命令行或选项文件中设置的选项都会优先。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB now supports temporal data tables in the form of system-versioning tables (allowing you to query and operate on historic data), application-time periods (allow you to query and operate on a temporal range of data), and bitemporal tables (which combine both system-versioning and application-time periods).
trans-unit.target: MariaDB现在支持以系统版本表(允许你对历史数据进行查询和操作)、应用时间段(允许你对时间范围内的数据进行查询和操作)和比特时间表(结合了系统版本和应用时间段)形式的时间数据表。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB provides a standard way of creating spatial columns for geometry types, for example, with CREATE TABLE or ALTER TABLE. Currently, spatial columns are supported for MyISAM, InnoDB, NDB, and ARCHIVE tables. See also SPATIAL INDEX.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB提供了一种为几何类型创建空间列的标准方法，例如，使用CREATE TABLE或ALTER TABLE。当前，MyISAM，InnoDB，NDB和ARCHIVE表支持空间列。另请参阅空间索引。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB provides convenient and easy to use helpers that allow the engine to initialize the TABLE_SHARE with minimal efforts. They are the TABLE_SHARE methods init_from_binary_frm_image() and init_from_sql_statement_string().
trans-unit.target: MariaDB提供了方便易用的帮助程序，这些帮助程序使引擎以最小的努力即可初始化 TABLE_SHARE 。它们是 TABLE_SHARE 方法 init_from_binary_frm_image() 和 init_from_sql_statement_string() 。

trans-unit.target: MariaDB提供了八个客户端认证插件。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB provides extensibility support through user defined functions. For more details on the MariaDB server framework see the user-defined-functions article. This documentation applies to MariaDB ColumnStore version 1.0.10 and above.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB通过用户定义的功能提供可扩展性支持。有关MariaDB服务器框架的更多详细信息，请参阅用户定义的功能文章。本文档适用于MariaDB ColumnStore版本1.0.10及更高版本。

trans-unit.target: MariaDB提供的选项和系统变量可用于复制从属服务器，以过滤二进制日志中复制的事件。

MariaDB sets the limit with setrlimit. MariaDB cannot set this to exceed the hard limit imposed by the operating system. Therefore, you may also need to change the hard limit. There are a few ways to do so.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB使用 setrlimit 设置限制。MariaDB不能将其设置为超过操作系统施加的硬限制。因此，您可能还需要更改硬限制。有几种方法可以这样做。

trans-unit.target: MariaDB与MySQL共享错误代码,同时也增加了一些MariaDB特有的新错误代码。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB ships with a separate utility for loading data from files: mysqlimport. It operates by sending LOAD DATA INFILE statements to the server.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB附带了一个单独的实用程序，用于从文件加载数据： mysqlimport 。它通过将 LOAD DATA INFILE 语句发送到服务器来运行。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB should never normally be run as root
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下,MariaDB不应该以root身份运行

trans-unit.source: MariaDB should never normally be run as the system's root user (this is unrelated to the MariaDB root user). If it is, any user with the FILE privilege can create or modify any files on the server as root.
trans-unit.target: 一般情况下,MariaDB不应该作为系统的根用户运行(这与MariaDB的根用户无关)。如果是的话,任何拥有FILE权限的用户都可以作为root用户创建或修改服务器上的任何文件。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB silently changes column specifications in certain situations:
trans-unit.target: MariaDB在某些情况下会默默地改变列的规格。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB since 10.1.7 behaves in a standard compatible manner — being part of a PRIMARY KEY, the nullable column gets an automatic NOT NULL constraint, on insertion one must specify a value for such a column. MariaDB before 10.1.7 was automatically assigning a default value of 0 — this behavior was non-standard. Issuing an error at CREATE TABLE time is also non-standard.
trans-unit.target: 从10.1.7开始，MariaDB的行为符合标准兼容方式-作为PRIMARY KEY的一部分，可为空的列将获得自动的NOT NULL约束，插入时必须为该列指定一个值。10.1.7之前的MariaDB自动分配了默认值0-此行为是非标准的。在CREATE TABLE时发出错误也是非标准的。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB source RPMs (SRPMs) are not packaged on all platforms for which MariaDB RPMs are packaged.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB源码RPM(SRPM)并不是打包在所有MariaDB RPM的平台上。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB starting with 10.1.x
MariaDB starting with 10.0None Th...

MariaDB stores VARCHAR values as a one-byte or two-byte length prefix plus data. The length prefix indicates the number of bytes in the value. A VARCHAR column uses one length byte if values require no more than 255 bytes, two length bytes if values may require more than 255 bytes.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB将VARCHAR值存储为一个字节或两个字节的长度前缀加上数据。长度前缀表示值中的字节数,如果值不需要255个字节,则使用一个长度字节,如果值可能需要两个长度字节,则使用两个长度字节。如果值要求不超过255个字节,则VARCHAR列使用一个长度字节,如果值可能要求超过255个字节,则使用两个长度字节。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB stores an IS_UPDATABLE flag with each view, so it is always possible to see if MariaDB considers a view updatable (although not necessarily insertable) by querying the IS_UPDATABLE column in the INFORMATION_SCHEMA.VIEWS table.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB为每个视图存储了一个IS_UPDATABLE标志,所以总是可以通过查询INFORMATION_SCHEMA.VIEWS表中的IS_UPDATABLE列来查看MariaDB是否认为一个视图是可更新的(尽管不一定是可插入的)。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB stores the sql_mode system variable setting that is in effect at the time a routine is created, and always executes the routine with this setting in force, regardless of the server SQL mode in effect when the routine is invoked.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB存储了在创建例程时生效的sql_mode系统变量设置，并且始终在该设置生效的情况下执行该例程，而与调用该例程时生效的服务器SQL模式无关。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB stores the SQL_MODE system variable setting that is in effect at the time a routine is created, and always executes the routine with this setting in force, regardless of the server SQL mode in effect when the routine is invoked.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB存储了在创建例程时有效的SQL_MODE系统变量设置,并且无论例程被调用时有效的服务器SQL模式是什么,都会以这个设置来执行例程。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB stores values internally in UTC, converting them to the required time zone as required.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB在内部以UTC存储值,根据需要将其转换为所需的时区。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB stores values that use the DATETIME data type in a format that supports values between 1000-01-01 00:00:00.000000 and 9999-12-31 23:59:59.999999.

MariaDB stores values that use the TIMESTAMP data type as the number of seconds since '1970-01-01 00:00:00' (UTC). This means that the TIMESTAMP data type can hold values between '1970-01-01 00:00:01' (UTC) and '2038-01-19 03:14:07' (UTC).
trans-unit.target: MariaDB存储使用 TIMESTAMP 数据类型的值作为自'1970-01-01 00:00:00'（UTC）以来的秒数。这意味着 TIMESTAMP 数据类型可以保存'1970-01-01 00:00:01 '（UTC）和'2038-01-19 03:14:07'（UTC）之间的值。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB supports a lot of commands and interfaces that are closer to NoSQL than to SQL.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB支持很多命令和接口,比SQL更接近NoSQL。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB supports a subset of the standard syntax for periods. At the moment it's only used for creating System-versioned tables. Both columns must be created, must be either of a TIMESTAMP(6) or BIGINT UNSIGNED type, and be generated as ROW START and ROW END accordingly. See System-versioned tables for details.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB在一段时间内支持标准语法的子集。目前，它仅用于创建系统版本的表。这两个列都必须创建，并且必须是 TIMESTAMP(6) 或 BIGINT UNSIGNED 类型，并分别作为 ROW START 和 ROW END 生成。有关详细信息，请参见系统版本表。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB supports both MySQL's executable comment format, and a slightly modified version specific to MariaDB. This way, if you have SQL code that works on MySQL and MariaDB, but not other databases, you can wrap it in a MySQL executable comment, and if you have code that specifically takes advantage of features only available in MariaDB you can use the MariaDB specific format to hide the code from MySQL.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB既支持MySQL的可执行注释格式,也支持MariaDB特有的稍微修改的版本。这样一来,如果你的SQL代码可以在MySQL和MariaDB上工作,但不能在其他数据库上工作,你可以用MySQL的可执行注释来包装它,如果你的代码专门利用了MariaDB才有的功能,你可以使用MariaDB特定的格式来隐藏代码,不让MySQL发现。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB supports certain prefixes that can be used with options. The supported option prefixes are:
trans-unit.target: MariaDB支持某些前缀,这些前缀可以和选项一起使用。支持的选项前缀有

trans-unit.source: MariaDB supports data-at-rest encryption for InnoDB and Aria storage engines. Additionally, it supports encrypting the InnoDB redo log and internal on-disk temporary tables that use the Aria storage engine..
trans-unit.target: MariaDB支持InnoDB和Aria存储引擎的静态数据加密。此外，它支持对使用Aria存储引擎的InnoDB重做日志和内部磁盘临时表进行加密。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB supports data-at-rest encryption for tables using the InnoDB and XtraDB storage engines. When enabled, the server encrypts data when it writes it to and decrypts data when it reads it from the file system.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB支持使用InnoDB和XtraDB存储引擎对表进行静态数据加密。启用后，服务器将数据写入文件时对其进行加密，而从文件系统读取数据时则对其进行解密。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB supports data-at-rest encryption for the InnoDB storage engine. When enabled, the Server encrypts data before writing it to the tablespace and decrypts reads from the tablespace before returning result-sets. This means that a malicious user attempting to exfiltrate sensitive data won't be able to import the tablespace onto a different server as shown above without the encryption key.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB支持InnoDB存储引擎的数据静态加密。启用后,服务器会在将数据写入表空间之前对数据进行加密,并在返回结果集之前对从表空间读取的数据进行解密。这意味着,如果没有加密密钥,试图外流敏感数据的恶意用户将无法将表空间导入到不同的服务器上,如上图所示。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB supports encryption for data while at rest and while in transit.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB支持在静止和传输中对数据进行加密。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB supports several different TLS and cryptography libraries.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB支持几种不同的TLS和加密库。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB supports several different modes which allow you to tune it to suit your needs.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB支持几种不同的模式,允许你根据自己的需求进行调整。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB supports spatial extensions that enable the creation, storage and analysis of geographic features. These can be used in the Aria, MyISAM, InnoDB/XtraDB and ARCHIVE engines in MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB支持空间扩展，可用于创建，存储和分析地理特征。这些可以在MariaDB 的Aria，MyISAM，InnoDB / XtraDB和ARCHIVE引擎中使用。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB supports spatial extensions to operate on spatial features. These features are available for Aria, MyISAM, InnoDB, NDB, and ARCHIVE tables.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB支持空间扩展以对空间要素进行操作。这些功能可用于Aria，MyISAM，InnoDB，NDB和ARCHIVE表。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB supports spatial extensions to operate on spatial features. These features are available for Aria, MyISAM, InnoDB, NDB, and ARCHIVE tables.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB支持空间扩展来操作空间特性。这些功能可用于Aria、MyISAM、InnoDB、NDB和ARCHIVE表。

trans-unit.target: MariaDB支持以下字符集和整理。

MariaDB supports the following server options related to authentication plugins:
trans-unit.target: MariaDB支持以下与认证插件相关的服务器选项。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB supports the implementation of constraints at the table-level using either CREATE TABLE or ALTER TABLE statements. A table constraint restricts the data you can add to the table. If you attempt to insert invalid data on a column, MariaDB throws an error.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB支持使用 CREATE TABLE 或 ALTER TABLE 语句在表级别实现约束。表约束限制了可以添加到表中的数据。如果尝试在列上插入无效数据，则MariaDB会引发错误。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB supports the use of multiple encryption keys. Each encryption key uses a 32-bit integer as a key identifier. If the specific plugin supports key rotation, then encryption keys can also be rotated, which creates a new version of the encryption key.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB支持使用多个加密密钥。每个加密密钥使用32位整数作为密钥标识符。如果特定的插件支持密钥旋转，那么还可以旋转加密密钥，这将创建加密密钥的新版本。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB supports the use of multiple encryption keys. Each encryption key uses a 32-bit integer as a key identifier. If the specific plugin supports key rotation, then encryption keys can also be rotated, which creates a new version of the encryption key.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB支持使用多个加密密钥。每个加密密钥使用32位整数作为密钥标识符。如果特定的插件支持密钥旋转，那么还可以旋转加密密钥，这将创建加密密钥的新版本。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB supports the use of data-at-rest encryption for tables and tablespa...
trans-unit.target: MariaDB支持对表和表帕使用数据静态加密。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB supports the use of data-at-rest encryption for tables and tablespaces from MariaDB 10.1. For a minor performance overhead of 3-5%, this makes it almost impossible for someone with access to the host system or who steals a hard drive to read the original data.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB支持对MariaDB 10.1中的表和表空间使用静态数据加密。对于3-5％的次要性能开销，这使得几乎不可能访问主机系统的人或窃取硬盘驱动器的人来读取原始数据。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB supports the use of multiple encryption keys. Each encryption key uses a 32-bit integer as a key identifier. If the specific plugin supports key rotation, then encryption keys can also be rotated, which creates a new version of the encryption key.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB支持使用多个加密密钥。每个加密密钥使用一个32位整数作为密钥标识符。如果特定的插件支持密钥轮换,那么加密密钥也可以轮换,从而创建一个新版本的加密密钥。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB supports the use of plugins, software components that may be added to the core software without having to rebuild the MariaDB server from source code. Therefore, plugins can be loaded at start-up, or loaded and unloaded while the server is running without interruption. Plugins are commonly used for adding desired storage engines, additional security requirements, and logging special information about the server.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB支持使用插件,这些软件组件可以添加到核心软件中,而无需从源代码重建MariaDB服务器。因此,插件可以在启动时加载,也可以在服务器运行时不间断地加载和卸载。插件通常用于添加所需的存储引擎、额外的安全要求以及记录服务器的特殊信息。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB supports the use of the ANALYZE TABLE SQL statement to analyze and store table key distribution. When MariaDB executes this statement, it calculates index cardinality through random dives on index trees. This makes it fast, but not always accurate as it does not check all rows. The data is only an estimate and repeated executions of this statement may return different results.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB支持使用ANALYZE TABLE SQL语句来分析和存储表密钥分布。当MariaDB执行此语句时，它将通过对索引树的随机潜水来计算索引基数。这使其速度很快，但并不总是准确的，因为它不会检查所有行。数据仅是估计值，重复执行此语句可能会返回不同的结果。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB supports transaction-precise history (only for the InnoDB storage engine) that allows seeing the data exactly as it would've been seen by a new connection doing a SELECT at the specified point in time — rows inserted before that point, but committed after will not be shown.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB支持事务精确的历史记录（仅适用于InnoDB存储引擎），该历史记录可以完全按照在指定时间点执行 SELECT 的新连接看到的数据查看数据- 在该时间点之前插入但在之后提交的行将不会显示。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB then creates a database directory on the configured path and the file-per-table tablespace will be created inside that directory. On Unix-like operating systems, you can see the file using the ls command:
trans-unit.target: 然后,MariaDB会在配置好的路径上创建一个数据库目录,并在该目录内创建文件-表空间。在类似Unix的操作系统上,你可以使用ls命令查看该文件。

trans-unit.target: 由于MariaDB 10.1.29中已修复的错误，MariaDB引发此错误。在这种情况下，更高版本不会引发错误。
