MariaDB tries to detect unsafe statements. When an unsafe statement is issued, a warning similar to the following is produced:
trans-unit.target: MariaDB会尝试检测不安全语句。当一个不安全的语句被发出时,会产生一个类似于下面的警告。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB understands a subset of Oracle's PL/SQL language.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB理解Oracle的PL/SQL语言的一个子集。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB upgrades to PCRE-8.34
MariaDB uses mrr_buffer_size as a limit of MRR buffer size for range access, while MySQL uses read_rnd_buffer_size.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB使用mrr_buffer_size作为 range 访问的MRR缓冲区大小的限制，而MySQL使用read_rnd_buffer_size。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB uses mysql-test to test functionality. It is an all-in-one test framework, doing unit, regression, and conformance testing. The framework was inherited from MySQL, but is greatly enhanced, optimized, and extended in MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB使用mysql-test来测试功能。它是一个多合一的测试框架，可以进行单元，回归和一致性测试。该框架继承自MySQL，但是在MariaDB中得到了极大的增强，优化和扩展。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB uses by default the Aria storage engine for internal temporary files instead of MyISAM. If you have a lot of temporary files, you should add and set aria-pagecache-buffer-size to the same value as you have for key-buffer-size.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，MariaDB将Aria存储引擎用于内部临时文件而不是MyISAM。如果您有很多临时文件，则应添加 aria-pagecache-buffer-size 并将其设置为与 key-buffer-size 相同的值。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB uses by default the Aria storage engine for internal temporary files. If you have many temporary files, you should set aria_pagecache_buffer_size to a reasonably large value so that temporary overflow data is not flushed to disk. The default is 128M.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，MariaDB使用Aria存储引擎存储内部临时文件。如果您有许多临时文件，则应将aria_pagecache_buffer_size设置为一个相当大的值，以使临时溢出数据不会刷新到磁盘。默认值为128M。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB uses plugins to handle key management and encryption of data.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB使用插件来处理数据的密钥管理和加密。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB uses semi-join optimizations to run IN subqueries starting from MariaDB 5.3. Starting in MariaDB 5.3.3, Semi-join subquery optimizations are enabled by default. You can disable them by turning off their optimizer_switch like so:
trans-unit.target: MariaDB使用半联接优化来运行从MariaDB 5.3开始的IN子查询。从MariaDB 5.3.3开始，默认情况下启用半连接子查询优化。您可以通过关闭它们的optimizer_switch来禁用它们，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: MariaDB uses the encryption key with ID 1 to encrypt binary logs.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB使用ID为1的加密密钥对二进制日志进行加密。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB uses the following modes for creating directories and files
trans-unit.target: MariaDB使用以下模式来创建目录和文件。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB uses the most efficient I/O multiplexing facilities for each operating system: Windows (the I/O completion port is used internally by the native threadpool), Linux (epoll), Solaris (event ports), FreeBSD and OSX (kevent). Oracle uses optimized I/O multiplexing only on Linux, with epoll, and uses poll() otherwise.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB为每个操作系统使用最有效的I/O复用设施。Windows(I/O完成端口由本地线程池内部使用)、Linux(epoll)、Solaris(事件端口)、FreeBSD和OSX(kevent)。Oracle只在Linux上使用优化的I/O复用,使用epoll,否则使用poll()。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB uses the stored key distribution to decide the order in which tables should be joined when you perform a join on something other than a constant. In addition, key distributions can be used when deciding which indexes to use for a specific table within a query.
trans-unit.target: 当你对常量以外的东西执行连接时,MariaDB使用存储键分布来决定表的连接顺序。此外,在决定对查询中的特定表使用哪些索引时,可以使用键分布。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB validates DATETIME literals against the session's time zone. For example, if a specific time range never occurred in a specific time zone due to daylight savings time, then DATETIME values within that range would be invalid for that time zone.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB 根据会话的时区验证 DATETIME 文字。例如，如果由于夏时制而导致在特定时区中从未出现过特定时间范围，则该范围内的 DATETIME 值对该时区将无效。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB version
MariaDB versus MySQL
MariaDB versus MySQL - Compatibility
MariaDB versus MySQL - Features
MariaDB when installed from the Debian repos has a number of differences with standard MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: 当从Debian仓库安装MariaDB时,MariaDB与标准的MariaDB有一些区别。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB will convert InnoDB tables (no need to do a dump/restore or ALTER TABLE).
trans-unit.target: MariaDB将转换InnoDB表（无需执行转储/恢复或 ALTER TABLE ）。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB will convert long table names properly.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB将正确转换长表名称。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB will convert long table names properly.
MariaDB will convert old archive tables to the new 5.1 format (note: new feature in testing).
trans-unit.target: MariaDB将把旧的存档表转换为新的5.1格式(注:新功能在测试中)。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB will convert old archive tables to the new 5.1 format.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB将把旧的存档表转换为新的5.1格式。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB will first call the C/C++ initialization function, x_init(), assuming it exists. All setup will be performed, and if it returns an error, the SQL statement is aborted and no further functions are called.
trans-unit.target: 如果存在，MariaDB将首先调用C / C ++初始化函数x_init（）。将执行所有设置，如果返回错误，则SQL语句将中止并且不再调用其他函数。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB will look in all of the above locations, in order, even if has already found an option file, and it's possible for more than one option file to exist. For example, you could have an option file in /etc/my.cnf with global settings for all servers, and then you could another option file in ~/.my.cnf (i.e.your user account's home directory) which will specify additional settings (or override previously specified setting) that are specific only to that user.
trans-unit.target: 即使已经找到了一个选项文件，MariaDB也会按顺序查找上述所有位置，并且可能存在多个选项文件。例如，您可以在 /etc/my.cnf 中有一个选项文件，其中包含所有服务器的全局设置，然后您可以在 ~/.my.cnf （即用户帐户的主目录）中找到另一个选项文件，该文件将指定其他设置（或覆盖先前指定的设置）（仅适用于该用户）。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB will normally return the error Fatal error: Please read "Security" section of the manual to find out how to run mysqld as root! if you attempt to run mysqld as root. If you need to override this restriction for some reason, start mysqld with the user=root option.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB通常会返回错误致命错误：请阅读手册的“安全性”部分，以了解如何以root用户身份运行mysqld！如果您尝试以root用户身份运行mysqld。如果由于某种原因需要覆盖此限制，请使用 user=root 选项启动mysqld 。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB will start writing history rows into partition p0, and when it reaches a size of 100000 rows, MariaDB will switch to partition p1. There are only two historical partitions, so when p1 overflows, MariaDB will issue a warning, but will continue writing into it.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB将开始将历史记录行写入分区 p0 ，当其大小达到100000行时，MariaDB将切换到分区 p1 。历史分区只有两个，因此当 p1 溢出时，MariaDB将发出警告，但将继续写入其中。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB would love for RAM allocations to be reasonably stable -- the caches are (mostly) pre-allocated; the threads, etc, are (mostly) of limited scope. ANY swapping is likely to severely hurt performance of MariaDB.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB很希望RAM的分配能够合理稳定--缓存是(大部分)预分配的;线程等(大部分)范围有限。任何交换都可能严重损害MariaDB的性能。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB's 10.2 thread_pool_priority=auto,high, low correspond to Percona's thread_pool_high_prio_mode=transactions,statements,none

MariaDB's clients and utilities, libmysqlclient, and MariaDB Connector/C are dynamically linked with the system's OpenSSL library in .deb packages provided by MariaDB Foundation's and MariaDB Corporation's repositories.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB的公司客户和公共事业，的libmysqlclient和MariaDB的连接器/ C动态与系统相连的OpenSSL库 .deb 通过MariaDB的基金会和MariaDB的公司的资料库提供的软件包。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB's clients and utilities, libmysqlclient, and MariaDB Connector/C are dynamically linked with the system's OpenSSL library in .rpm packages.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB的公司客户和公共事业，的libmysqlclient和MariaDB的连接器/ C动态与系统相连的OpenSSL库中 .rpm 软件包。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB's CONNECT storage engine can be used to migrate from PostgreSQL to MariaDB. There are two primary ways that this can be done.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB的CONNECT存储引擎可用于从PostgreSQL迁移到MariaDB。有两种主要方法可以完成此操作。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB's data-at-rest encryption requires the use of a key management and encryption plugin. These plugins are responsible both for the management of encryption keys and for the actual encryption and decryption of data.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB的静态数据加密需要使用密钥管理和加密插件。这些插件既负责加密密钥的管理，又负责数据的实际加密和解密。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB's data-at-rest encryption requires the use of a key management and encryption plugin. These plugins are responsible both for the management of encryption keys and for the actual encryption and decryption of data.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB的静态数据加密需要使用密钥管理和加密插件。这些插件既负责加密密钥的管理，又负责数据的实际加密和解密。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB's Dynamic Columns

MariaDB's global transaction IDs (GTIDs) are very useful when used with MariaDB replication, which is primarily what that feature was developed for. Galera Cluster, on the other hand, was developed by Codership for all MySQL and MariaDB variants, and the initial development of the technology pre-dated MariaDB's GTID implementation. As a side effect, MariaDB Galera Cluster only partially supports MariaDB's GTID implementation.
trans-unit.target: 当与MariaDB复制一起使用时，MariaDB的全局事务ID（GTID）非常有用，这主要是为该功能开发的。另一方面，Galera Cluster是由Codership为所有MySQL和MariaDB变体开发的，该技术的最初开发早于MariaDB的GTID实现。副作用是，MariaDB Galera Cluster仅部分支持MariaDB的GTID实现。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB's replication implementation requires several types of threads.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB的复制实现需要几种类型的线程。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB's RPM packages were built with OpenSSL 1.0.1 on RHEL 7 and CentOS 7, even after OpenSSL 1.0.2 became available on those distributions. As a side effect, the clients and utilities bundled in these packages did not support server certificate verification with the subjectAltName field, even if the packages were installed on a system that had OpenSSL 1.0.2 installed. Starting with MariaDB MariaDB 10.1.39, MariaDB 10.2.23, MariaDB 10.3.14, and MariaDB 10.4.4, MariaDB's RPM packages on RHEL 7 and CentOS 7 are built with OpenSSL 1.0.2. See MDEV-18277 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 即使在这些发行版中可以使用OpenSSL 1.0.2之后，MariaDB的RPM软件包还是在RHEL 7和CentOS 7上使用OpenSSL 1.0.1 构建的。副作用是，即使这些软件包安装在已安装OpenSSL 1.0.2的系统上，这些软件包中捆绑的客户端和实用程序也不支持使用subjectAltName字段进行服务器证书验证。从MariaDB MariaDB 10.1.39，MariaDB 10.2.23，MariaDB 10.3.14和MariaDB 10.4.4开始，RHEL 7和CentOS 7上的MariaDB RPM软件包都是使用OpenSSL 1.0.2构建的。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-18277。

If an SST takes longer than this default startup timeout on a joiner node, then systemd will assume that mysqld has failed to startup, which causes systemd to kill the mysqld process on the joiner node. To work around this, you can reconfigure the MariaDB systemd unit to have an infinite timeout, such as by executing one of the following commands:

trans-unit.source: MariaDB's systemd unit file has a default startup timeout of about 90 seconds on most systems. If a service startup takes longer than this default startup timeout, then systemd will assume that mysqld has failed to startup, which causes systemd to kill the mysqld process. To work around this, it can be changed by configuring the TimeoutStartSec option for the systemd service.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数系统上，MariaDB的 systemd 单位文件的默认启动超时约为90秒。如果服务的启动比这个默认启动超时的时间较长，那么 systemd 将假定 mysqld 未能启动，这将导致 systemd 杀死 mysqld 的进程。要解决此问题，可以通过为 systemd 服务配置 TimeoutStartSec 选项来更改它。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB's systemd unit file has a default startup timeout of about 90 seconds on most systems. If an SST takes longer than this default startup timeout on a joiner node, then systemd will assume that mysqld has failed to startup, which causes systemd to kill the mysqld process on the joiner node. To work around this, you can reconfigure the MariaDB systemd unit to have an infinite timeout. See Introduction to State Snapshot Transfers (SSTs): SSTs and Systemd for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数系统上，MariaDB的 systemd 单位文件的默认启动超时约为90秒。如果SST在联接节点上花费的时间比此默认的启动超时时间长，则 systemd 将假定 mysqld 启动失败，这将导致 systemd 杀死联接节点上的 mysqld 进程。要解决此问题，您可以将MariaDB systemd 单元重新配置为具有无限超时。有关更多信息，请参见状态快照传输（SST）简介：SST和Systemd。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB's systemd unit file has a default startup timeout of about 90 seconds on most systems. If certain startup tasks, such as crash recovery, take longer than this default startup timeout, then systemd will assume that mysqld has failed to startup, which causes systemd to kill the mysqld process. To work around this, you can reconfigure the MariaDB systemd unit to have an infinite timeout.
trans-unit.target: 在大多数系统上，MariaDB的 systemd 单位文件的默认启动超时约为90秒。如果某些启动任务，如故障恢复，比这个默认启动超时需要更长的时间，那么 systemd 将假定 mysqld 未能启动，这将导致 systemd 杀死 mysqld 的进程。要解决此问题，您可以将MariaDB systemd 单元重新配置为具有无限超时。

trans-unit.target: MariaDB的 systemd 单位文件包含在RPM和DEB的服务器软件包中。它也包含在某些二进制压缩文件中。

MariaDB's build system cannot include the mariadb@.service template unit file in RPM packages on platforms that have cmake versions older than 3.3.0, because these cmake versions have a bug that causes it to encounter errors when packaging a file in RPMs if the file name contains the @ character. MariaDB's RHEL 7 and CentOS 7 RPM build hosts only got a new enough cmake version starting with MariaDB 10.1.39, MariaDB 10.2.23, and MariaDB 10.3.14. To use this functionality on a MariaDB version that does not have the file, you can copy the file from a package that does have the file.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB的构建系统不能在 cmake 版本早于3.3.0的平台上的RPM软件包中包含 mariadb@.service 模板单元文件，因为这些 cmake 版本存在一个错误，导致在将文件打包到RPM中时遇到错误（如果该文件）名称包含 @ 字符。从MariaDB 10.1.39，MariaDB 10.2.23和MariaDB 10.3.14开始，MariaDB的RHEL 7和CentOS 7 RPM构建主机仅获得了足够新的 cmake 版本。要在没有文件的MariaDB版本上使用此功能，可以从没有文件的软件包中复制文件。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB's data-at-rest encryption implementation re-used previously unused fields in InnoDB's buffer pool pages to identify the encryption key version and the post-encryption checksum. Prior to MySQL 5.1.48, these unused fields were not initialized in memory due to performance concerns. These fields still had zero values most of the time, but since they were not explicitly initialized, that means that these fields could have occasionally had non-zero values that could have been written into InnoDB's tablespace files. If MariaDB were to encounter an unencrypted page from a tablespace file that was created on an early version of MySQL that also had non-zero values in these fields, then it would mistakenly think that the page was encrypted.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB的数据静态加密实现重新使用了InnoDB的缓冲池页面中以前未使用的字段,以确定加密密钥版本和加密后的校验和。在MySQL 5.1.48之前,由于性能问题,这些未使用的字段没有在内存中初始化。这些字段在大多数时候仍然是零值,但由于它们没有被显式初始化,这意味着这些字段偶尔可能会有非零值,这些值可能会被写入InnoDB的表空间文件中。如果MariaDB遇到一个在MySQL早期版本上创建的表空间文件中的未加密页面,这些字段中也有非零值,那么它就会误以为这个页面是加密的。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB's data-at-rest encryption requires the use of a key management and encryption plugin. These plugins are responsible both for the management of encryption keys and for the actual encryption and decryption of data.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB的静态数据加密需要使用密钥管理和加密插件。这些插件既负责加密密钥的管理，又负责数据的实际加密和解密。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB's default my.cnf files come with a section for TokuDB. To enable TokuDB just remove the '#' comment markers from the options in the TokuDB section.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB的默认 my.cnf 文件随附TokuDB的一部分。要启用TokuDB，只需从TokuDB部分的选项中删除“＃”注释标记。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB's generated columns syntax is designed to be similar to the syntax for Microsoft SQL Server's computed columns and Oracle Database's virtual columns. In MariaDB 10.2 and later, the syntax is also compatible with the syntax for MySQL's generated columns.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB生成的列语法的设计类似于Microsoft SQL Server的计算列和Oracle Database的虚拟列的语法。在MariaDB 10.2和更高版本中，该语法还与MySQL生成的column的语法兼容。

trans-unit.source: MariaDB's group commit counters are:

MariaDB's internal algorithms assume that memory is not swap, and are highly inefficient if it is. Some algorithms are intended to avoid or delay disk IO, and use memory where possible - performing this with swap can be worse than just doing it on disk in the first place.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB的内部算法假设内存不是swap,如果是swap,则效率非常低。有些算法是为了避免或延迟磁盘IO,尽可能地使用内存--用swap来执行,可能比当初只在磁盘上做更糟糕。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup and BACKUP STAGE Commands

Mariabackup backs up encrypted and unencrypted tables as they are on the original server. If a table is encrypted, then the table will remain encrypted in the backup. Similarly, if a table is unencrypted, then the table will remain unencrypted in the backup.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup备份加密和未加密的表,因为它们在原始服务器上。如果一个表是加密的,那么在备份中该表将保持加密。同样,如果表是未加密的,那么该表在备份中也将保持未加密状态。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup backs up many different files in order to perform its backup operation. See Files Backed up by Mariabackup for a list of these files.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup备份许多不同的文件以执行其备份操作。有关这些文件的列表，请参见Mariabackup备份的文件。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup backs up many different files in order to perform its operations.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup备份了许多不同的文件以执行其操作。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup backs up the files listed below.
Mariabackup backs up the following InnoDB data files:
Mariabackup can also be installed via a package manager on Linux. In order to do so, your system needs to be configured to install from one of the MariaDB repositories.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup也可以通过Linux上的包管理器进行安装。为了做到这一点,你的系统需要配置成从MariaDB存储库中的一个安装。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup can perform compression operations on the backup files before writing them to disk. It can also use multiple threads for parallel data compression during this process. Using this option, you can set the chunk size each thread uses during compression. It defaults to 64K.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup可以在将备份文件写入磁盘之前对其进行压缩操作。它还可以在此过程中使用多个线程进行并行数据压缩。使用此选项,您可以设置每个线程在压缩过程中使用的块大小。它的默认值为64K。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup can perform compression operations on the backup files before writing them to disk. Using this option, you can define the number of threads you want to use for this operation. You may find this useful in speeding up the compression of particularly large databases. It defaults to single-threaded.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup 可以在将备份文件写入磁盘之前对其进行压缩操作。使用此选项,您可以定义您要用于此操作的线程数。您可能会发现这对加快压缩特别是大型数据库的速度很有用。它的默认值是单线程。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup can perform full and incremental backups. A full backup creates a snapshot of the database in the target directory. An incremental backup checks the database against a previously taken full backup, (defined by the --incremental-basedir option) and creates delta files for these changes.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup可以执行完整和增量备份。完全备份在目标目录中创建数据库的快照。增量备份将根据以前执行的完整备份（由 --incremental-basedir 选项定义）检查数据库，并为这些更改创建增量文件。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup can store data about its operations on the MariaDB Server. Using this option, you can define the UUID it uses in identifying a previous backup to increment from. It checks --incremental-history-name, --incremental-basedir, and --incremental-lsn. If Mariabackup fails to find a valid lsn, it generates an error.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup可以在MariaDB服务器上存储有关其操作的数据。使用此选项，您可以定义用于标识要从其增量的先前备份的UUID。它检查 --incremental-history-name ， --incremental-lsn --incremental-basedir 和--incremental-lsn。如果Mariabackup无法找到有效的lsn，则会生成错误。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup can store data about its operations on the MariaDB Server. Using this option, you can define the logical name it uses in identifying the backup.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup可以在MariaDB服务器上存储有关其操作的数据。使用此选项,您可以定义它在识别备份时使用的逻辑名称。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup cannot currently backup a subset of partitions from a partitioned table. Backing up a partitioned table is currently an all-or-nothing selection. See MDEV-17132 about that. If you need to backup a subset of partitions, then one possibility is that instead of using Mariabackup, you can export the file-per-table tablespaces of the partitions.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup当前无法从分区表中备份分区的子集。目前，备份分区表是一项全有或全无的选择。有关此信息，请参见MDEV-17132。如果您需要备份一部分分区，则一种可能性是可以导出分区的每表文件表空间而不是使用Mariabackup 。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup creates many different files in order to perform its operations.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup会创建许多不同的文件来执行其操作。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup creates several different types of files during the backup and prepare phases. See Files Created by Mariabackup for a list of these files.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup在备份和准备阶段会创建几种不同类型的文件。有关这些文件的列表，请参见Mariabackup创建的文件。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup creates the following files:

trans-unit.target: Mariabackup并没有备份下面列出的文件。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup does not check if GTIDs are being used in replication. It takes a shortcut and assumes that if the gtid_slave_pos system variable is non-empty, then it writes the CHANGE MASTER command with the MASTER_USE_GTID option set to slave_pos. Otherwise, it writes the CHANGE MASTER command with the MASTER_LOG_FILE and MASTER_LOG_POS options using the master's binary log file and position. See MDEV-19264 for more information.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup并没有检查是否GTIDs复制正在使用。它采用一种快捷方式，并假定如果 gtid_slave_pos 系统变量为非空，则它将写入 CHANGE MASTER 命令并将 MASTER_USE_GTID 选项设置为 slave_pos 。否则，它将使用主数据库的二进制日志文件和位置，使用 MASTER_LOG_FILE 和 MASTER_LOG_POS 选项写入 CHANGE MASTER 命令。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-19264。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup does not currently support partial backups for MyRocks.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup当前不支持MyRocks的部分备份。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup does not need to authenticate with the database server when preparing or restoring a backup.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup在准备或恢复备份时不需要与数据库服务器进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup does not support lockless binlog.

Mariabackup dumps replication coordinates in two forms: GTID strings and binary log file and position coordinates, like the ones you would normally see from SHOW MASTER STATUS output. In this case, it is probably better to use the GTID coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup以两种形式转储复制坐标：GTID字符串和二进制日志文件以及位置坐标，就像通常从 SHOW MASTER STATUS 输出中看到的那样。在这种情况下，最好使用GTID坐标。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup dumps replication coordinates in two forms: GTID coordinates and binary log file and position coordinates, like the ones you would normally see from SHOW MASTER STATUS output. We can choose which set of coordinates we would like to use to set up replication.
trans-unit.target: Mariabackup以两种形式转储复制坐标：GTID坐标以及二进制日志文件和位置坐标，就像通常在 SHOW MASTER STATUS 输出中看到的那样。我们可以选择要用来设置复制的坐标集。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup from MariaDB 10.1 releases may also be able to back up MariaDB Server from MariaDB 5.5 and MariaDB 10.0 releases in many cases. However, this is not fully supported. See MDEV-14936 for more information.
trans-unit.target: 在许多情况下，MariaDB 10.1版本中的Mariabackup 也可以从MariaDB 5.5和MariaDB 10.0版本中备份MariaDB Server 。但是，这不完全支持。有关更多信息，请参见MDEV-14936。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup from MariaDB Community Server does not currently perform any tasks in the BLOCK_DDL stage.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB社区服务器的 BLOCK_DDL 当前在BLOCK_DDL阶段不执行任何任务。

trans-unit.source: Mariabackup from MariaDB Community Server does not currently perform any tasks in the FLUSH stage.
trans-unit.target: MariaDB社区服务器的Mariabackup当前在 FLUSH 阶段不执行任何任务。
